alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:22PM CDT until June 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Southeastern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 822 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 22 miles north of Ellsworth, or 23 miles south of Rushville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Big Hill, Billys Lake and Argo Hill. This includes Highway 250 between mile markers 18 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of and north central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of and north central Nebraska.
